rules_text:
Flying
When this creature enters, seize The Core. [i](Get {E} or surveil 1. A player with the core seizes it at their upkeep. Unblocked creatures seize the core.)[/i]
Whenever this creature attacks, you may pay {E}{E}{E}. If you do, teach target creature you control flying. [i](Put a flying counter on it. If it already has flying, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead.)[/i]
